sentence.text: We investigated the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of the biomarkers of S-G2-M phases of cell cycle, Aurora kinase B (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) and geminin (negative regulation of DNA replication), on disease progression in neuroblastomas.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and negative regulation of DNA replication was studied by immunostaining 84 neuroblastomas.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The PI for both markers was significantly higher in neuroblastomas from patients with unfavorable clinical (high-risk group, advanced stage, age â‰¥18 months at presentation, primary abdominal compared to extra-abdominal sites), biological (positive regulation of gene expression amplification, 1p deletion, 17q gain), and pathological (undifferentiated or poorly differentiated status, high mitosis-karyorrhexis index, [MKI], unfavorable histology) factors.
